T02D3038:80b-0: @80b * // dpal rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D3038:80b-1: pha rol gyi byad stems las grol bar 'dod pa'i sgrub pa po dam tshig dang ldan pas /
T02D3038:80b-2: dur khrod kyi ras la khyi nag po'i khrag gis
T02D3038:80b-3: 'khor lo rtsibs sum cu rtsa gnyis pa byis te
T02D3038:80b-4: / lte bar che ge stam bha ya bri /
T02D3038:80b-5: rtsibs rnams la khro bo bcu'i sngags mgo nang du bstan pa bri /
T02D3038:81a-0: mu khyud nang rma la a'a li mgo nang du bstan pa @81a * //
T02D3038:81a-2: phyi ma la k'a li mgo nang du bstan pa
T02D3038:81a-3: bris la bdag nyid la lho phyogs su blhas la
T02D3038:81a-4: 'khor lo la rab tu gnas pa byas la /
T02D3038:81a-5: khro bo bcu'i sngags la stong phrag lnga bzlas la /
T02D3038:81a-6: de nas g-yul gyes pa'i sa dang /
T02D3038:81a-9: phung shul gyis las mchod rten khru gang ba rim pa lnga byas la /
T02D3038:81a-10: de'i nang du yang gro ga la lingga bris la
T02D3038:81a-11: lce phyir phyung la lce la dug gi phur pa
T02D3038:81a-12: rgya mdud nub par btab la /
T02D3038:81a-13: che ge mo'i byad kha rnams bzlog / byol stam
T02D3038:81a-14: bha ya h'um h'um h'um zhes pas mtha' ma bskor
T02D3038:81a-15: / mchod rten gyi bre'i nang du gzhug go //
T02D3038:81a-16: bdag nyid kyi mal 'og tu dong gru gsum pa
T02D3038:81a-17: brus la nang dur khrod kyi sol bas byugs la
T02D3038:81a-18: / 'khor lo de phur bu bcu gsum gyis brgyangs
T02D3038:81a-19: la de'i steng du nas nag mo dang sran ma
T02D3038:81a-20: / dang / yungs nag rnams bkram la /
T02D3038:81a-21: de'i steng du mchod rten mgo mjug bzlog la gzhag go ;
T02D3038:81a-22: / de nas nang rnams su dug shing gi tsher mas dgang ngo //
T02D3038:81a-23: kha dur khrod kyi g-yam pa la ri rab gling bzhi dang bcas pas mnan no //
T02D3038:81a-25: yugs sa mo'i zhabs ma bting las bdag gi zhal dbyung ngo //
T02D3038:81a-26: bdag nyid nyal ba'i tshe aom ha ra ha ra
T02D3038:81a-27: badzra che ge mo'i byad stems sha tr'um h'um h'um
T02D3038:81a-28: zhes khro bo bcu'i sngags la btags la /
T02D3038:81a-29: ji ltar 'grub pa'am ma chag par bzlas so //
T02D3038:81a-30: dus bzhir gtor ma chung ba bcu phyogs bcur 'phang
T02D3038:81a-31: zhing khro bo bcu la dmod btsugs shing ma nyes
T02D3038:81a-32: pa'i rabs brjod 'jig rten gyi lha 'dre rnams la
T02D3038:81a-33: dam pa dar zhing dpang gzugs pa ;
T02D3038:81a-34: phyogs rnams su seng ldeng gi phur bu re la
T02D3038:81a-35: khro bo bcu'i sngags bris la dpal che ge byad
T02D3038:81a-36: stems m'a ra ya bzlog sod byol zhes bris la
T02D3038:81a-37: bdag nyid kyi gnas khang gi phyogs mtshams dang /
T02D3038:81a-39: phur bu de dag kyang khro bo bcur mnga' gsol la gtor ma re btang /
T02D3038:81a-40: nya stong la phur bu de gzi brjid bskyed do //
T02D3038:81a-41: gtor ma gtang ba'i dus su yungs kar dang dug
T02D3038:81a-42: sna la sngags bzlas la phyogs mtshams su gtor ro
T02D3038:81a-43: // dur khrod du yang skabs su mnan pa bya'o //
T02D3038:81a-44: skabs su gtor ma dang bsgrub bya'i lingga chu la bskur ro //
T02D3038:81a-45: skabs su me la bsreg go //
T02D3038:81b-0: de ltar byas @81b pas gdon thams cad kha 'ching bar 'gyur ro //
T02D3038:81b-1: byad stems thams cad sbod gtong byed pa de nyid rang la nges par bzlog par nges so //
T02D3038:81b-2: byad stims thams cad gcod pa dang /
T02D3038:81b-3: phur kha thams cad bzlog pa'i phyir bzlog pa'i 'khor lo zhes bya ba /
